creator: matt.tait@gmail.com
text:
In function "apr_app_initialize", the method frees the result of an earlier call to API "CommandLineToArgvW" via the method "GlobalFree", however the correct de-allocator is "LocalFree" (a different memory de-allocator).

This is explicitly documented in Windows as unsafe/undocumented behaviour. ("It is not safe to free memory allocated with GlobalAlloc" - https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa366730(v=vs.85).aspx).
